sources.title: Beginning of the End
sources.description: Title: Beginning of the End Summary: Audrey Ames, an enterprising journalist, tries to get the scoop on giant grasshoppers accidentally created at the Illinois State experimental farm. She endeavors to save Chicago, despite a ... Directed by: Bert I. Gordon Actors: Production Company: AB-PT Pictures Corp. Release Date: 28 June 1957 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.66 : 1 Audrey Ames, an enterprising journalist, tries to get the scoop on giant grasshoppers accidentally created at the Illinois State experimental farm. She endeavors to save Chicago, despite a military cover-up.

sources.title: Beginning of the End 1957 colorized (Peter Graves)
sources.description: A curious reporter (Peggie Castle) discovers that the complete destruction of a small town was caused by giant locusts that were accidentally enlarged by a scientist (Peter Graves) experimenting with radioactivity to increase plant growth. They must be stopped before they overrun Chicago. Peter Graves as Dr. Ed Wainwright Peggie Castle as Audrey Aimes Morris Ankrum as Gen. John Hanson Than Wyenn as Frank Johnson Thomas Browne Henry as Col. Tom Sturgeon Richard Benedict as Cpl. Mathias James Seay as Capt. James Barton John Close as Maj. Everett I colorized this using AI software that doesn't always get the colors right, but I think it looks fairly natural. Hopefully a more professional job will be done someday.

metadata.Plot: Enterprising journalist Audrey Ames (Peggie Castle) is determined to get the scoop on enormous grasshoppers that were accidentally created at the Illinois State experimental farm, and she endeavors to save Chicago despite a military cover-up.
metadata.Actors: Peter Graves, Peggie Castle, Morris Ankrum
